flexbox.name: Flexbox
flexbox.description: These flexbox-based utilities can replace the need for a grid system in many instances.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: This module contains responsive float and width utilities to create a variety of grid layouts. Use this module in combination with layout, white space, and other utilities.

layout.name: Layout
layout.description: Change the default document flow with these display, float, and other utilities.

margin.name: Margin
margin.description:
Immutable margin utilities are based on a global white space scale defined with custom properties.

Naming Convention

Due to the ubiquitous nature of setting margin, these utilities use a shorthand naming convention:

Shorthand Description
mMargin
tTop
rRight
bBottom
lLeft
xX-axis (left and right)
yY-axis (top and bottom)
nNegative
00 reset
1$space-1 (.25rem)
2$space-2 (.5rem)
3$space-3 (1rem)
4$space-4 (2rem)
4$space-5 (4rem)
4$space-6 (8rem)

padding.name: Padding
padding.description:
Immutable padding utilities are based on a global white space scale defined with custom properties.

Naming Convention

Due to the ubiquitous nature of setting padding, these utilities use a shorthand naming convention:

Shorthand Description
pPadding
tTop
rRight
bBottom
lLeft
xX-axis (left and right)
yY-axis (top and bottom)
nNegative (margin only)
00 reset
1$space-1 (.25rem)
2$space-2 (.5rem)
3$space-3 (1rem)
4$space-4 (2rem)
4$space-5 (4rem)
4$space-6 (6rem)

markup.modifier: This will have a padding bottom
markup.example: This will have a padding bottom
markup.escaped: <div class="pb1">This will have a padding bottom</div>

position.name: Position
position.description: This module includes basic positioning utilities to alter the default document flow. Use positions with caution. They are often unnecessary and commonly misused.

typescale.name: Typescale
typescale.description: This module provides utilities for adjusting font-size.

typography.name: Typography
typography.description: Change typographic weights, styles, and alignment with these utility styles.
